message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60%, you take 40%. This way we both get a good chunk of money before inflation eats into it.
Your offer was a bit too greedy, Alice. Let's be fair - I'll take a slightly larger share this time, considering the inflation.
While I appreciate the consideration of inflation, Bob, I believe a more equitable split is still possible. Let's see what the next round brings.
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle. I'll take the same share you offered me last round - 55% -  considering the money is worth even less now.
